Error: open fails, File not found: C:\Users\*****\Downloads\Tales of Monkey Island\Tales.of.Monkey.Island.Episode.102.The.Siege.of.Spinner.Cay.v1.0.0.18\Crack\MonkeyIsland102.exe (Access is denied) 

I'm thinking this is because avg stops it..

I am however not afraid of "virus warnings" when it comes to cracks.. they are almost always claimed to be "virus", which to my experience is hardly ever the case.

Any half-decent virus scanner should tell you exactly what it detected. A match to known malware in a blacklist should be taken seriously. A match to "hacker tools" and the like can obviously be ignored.

A match based on dubious "heuristics" can mean anything.

And of course, virus scanners detecting nothing sure as hell doesn't mean something is clean.

Makes me wonder why nobody ever uses GPG signatures when distributing stuff. Certainly not the scene, which seems to be stuck in a 1980 time warp.

Figured out why the crack wasn't working for me...

For AVG users: you need to go into "msconfig" from your start menu and go under your startup tab and disable the AVG internet security from your startup, and then under services disable the three items related to AVG. I would do this before even trying to download the torrent, but once i did that the cracks would run whereas they just acted like dead files before. Hope that helps.
